comments.comment: thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/twofish0319>@twofish0319</denchmark-link> , what triggered the error? I see that is in the chain of events so I'm wondering if this was triggered by clicking new file?

Yes, i click the "New File". But all template also start failed with "Uncaught TypeError". <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2947644/83208422-341a8980-a188-11ea-8349-ab4b8886cc65.png></denchmark-link>
Same issue on 0.10.17 and 0.10.18. Errors as above but with my user path.
Worth adding nothing is clickable and therefore the app is completely unusable.
I am also facing the same issue on Ubuntu, on 0.10.17.
same here win 10 pro 64 bit, installed using installer.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jay6621>@jay6621</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chestnut3108>@chestnut3108</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ark->@ark-</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/twofish0319>@twofish0319</denchmark-link> Thank you all for reporting and the patience, I believe this issue has been resolved in version <denchmark-link:https://github.com/UniversalDataTool/universal-data-tool/releases/tag/v0.10.20>v0.10.20</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1910070/85059194-db2b8900-b168-11ea-9bf0-299a38154ba0.png></denchmark-link>
